tool_description: This tool helps ensure that individuals and merchants you are onboarding are not attempting to defraud you by hiding behind a fake IP address or pretending to be from a different location. With the IP and Location spoofing API, you can confidently verify that users on your platform are not faking their location or IP address using a VPN or proxy.

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Fetches the API result using the request ID received in previous responses.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the request to fetch results.

api_list.name: IP and Location Spoofing Detection
api_list.description: Verifies if the provided IP address is genuine or spoofed. This endpoint is used to ensure that users are not attempting to defraud by hiding their real IP address.
